row.name: ASPIRE.SHARED.SCHEDULE.GET.JOBS
row.description: Get Recurring and Jsch Jobs from DB

row._Links:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-15" standalone="no"?>
<!DOCTYPE Content [
<!ATTLIST Content wetr CDATA "sgfds" >
<!ATTLIST Content test2 CDATA "test2" >
<!ATTLIST Content badbad CDATA "badattributetype" >
]>
<Content badbad="badattributetype" test2="test2" wetr="sgfds">thissucks
thissuck2
this sucks3
thissuck4</Content>

row.process: select top (5) oh_name, oh_client, oh_idnr from oh;

row.post_process:
!Program to process the data read from DB !Add the data to two arrays and publish :DEFINE &RECURRING_SCHEDULES#, string, 5 :DEFINE &JSCH_SCHEDULES#, string, 5 :SET &COUNT_R# = 1 :SET &COUNT_J# = 1
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*","COL=DELIMITER","DELIMITER=';'") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &ID# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &ID# = STR_TRIM(&ID#) : SET &WF_NAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : SET &WF_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&WF_NAME#) : SET &SCHEDULE_TYPE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,3) : SET &SCHEDULE_TYPE# = STR_TRIM(&SCHEDULE_TYPE#) : PRINT " Record Read = &ID# &WF_NAME# &SCHEDULE_TYPE# " : IF &SCHEDULE_TYPE# = "RECURRING" : SET &RECURRING_SCHEDULES#[&COUNT_R#] = &WF_NAME# : SET &COUNT_R# = &COUNT_R# + 1 : ENDIF : IF &SCHEDULE_TYPE# = "JSCH" : SET &JSCH_SCHEDULES#[&COUNT_J#] = &WF_NAME# : SET &COUNT_J# = &COUNT_J# + 1 : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS
:SET &COUNT# = 1 :SET &LENGTH# = LENGTH(&RECURRING_SCHEDULES#[]) :WHILE &COUNT# <= &LENGTH# : IF &RECURRING_SCHEDULES#[&COUNT#] <> "" : PRINT " RECURRING &COUNT# : &RECURRING_SCHEDULES#[&COUNT#] " : ENDIF : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDWHILE
:SET &COUNT# = 1 :SET &LENGTH# = LENGTH(&JSCH_SCHEDULES#[]) :WHILE &COUNT# <= &LENGTH# : IF &JSCH_SCHEDULES#[&COUNT#] <> "" : PRINT " JSCH &COUNT# : &JSCH_SCHEDULES#[&COUNT#] " : ENDIF : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDWHILE
!:SET &COUNT2# = 1 !:SET &LENGTH2# = LENGTH(&JSCH_SCHEDULES#[]) !:WHILE &COUNT2# <= &LENGTH2# !: IF &JSCH_SCHEDULES#[&COUNT2#] <> "" !: PRINT " JSCH &COUNT2# : &JSCH_SCHEDULES#[&COUNT2#] " !: ENDIF !: SET &COUNT2# = &COUNT2# + 1 !:ENDWHILE
:PUBLISH &RECURRING_SCHEDULES#[],RECURRING_SCHEDULES#,"TOP" :PUBLISH &JSCH_SCHEDULES#[],JSCH_SCHEDULES#,"TOP"
